EmailTemplate.subject: How to Reset a CERS Business User Account Password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How to reset a CERS Business user account password:
Open your web browser and navigate to the “CERS Business Sign In” page. (Select the “Business Portal Sign In” link from the top of CERS Central: http://cers.calepa.ca.gov) Select the “Forgot your Username or Password?” link, from the sign-in section. Select the “Reset my Password” button. Enter your e-mail address and the verification characters shown in the image. Then, select the “Next” button. A “Password Reset Request” notification message will then be sent to your e-mail address. Open the link provided in this e-mail message. Again, enter your e-mail address and the verification characters shown in the image. Then, select the “Next” button. Enter a new CERS user account password and select the “Next” button. A confirmation page will inform you that your CERS user account password has been successfully reset. You can then return to the CERS Business Sign In page and sign-in with your username and new password.
